general.description: The FC22-U Crystal Gun is one of the oldest weapon designs in the galaxy today, dating back to the times of the Federation. It fires a rapid stream of high velocity projectiles at a target, dealing damage thru sheer kinetic impact. FC22-U Crystal Guns are popular among small time pirates for being an easy to use, reliable weapon.
